component.name: LXCOMM
component.summary: Mod browser, downloader and manager made for XCOM2(WOTC) on Linux

description.p: LXCOMM (Linux XCOM2 Mod Manager) is a mod browser, downloader and manager made specifically for non-Steam versions of XCOM2(WOTC) on Linux.

LXCOMM itself is licensed under the MIT or Apache-2.0 at a given contributor's choice. However, it makes use of the SteamCMD binary/shell script for interacting with and downloading from the Steam Workshop. For ease of use, this flatpak comes with SteamCMD bundled. By installing this flatpak, you agree to Valve's usage terms as laid out by their Steam Subscriber Agreement as well as SteamCMD's own license agreement. If you do not agree to the terms of either of these licenses, you should not install the LXCOMM flatpak.
